replies.message: Hi Numan. If your account has been disabled you'll need to submit an appeal in a few easy steps. Learn how in the Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1gubVui - Leigh

Sorry, this is off-topic, but Facebook doesn't make it easy to contact someone, does it? (I've gone to the Feedback page already; if you're going to send me there, please tell me exactly where I can report this.) I sometimes get images of porn films on the right side of my screen, where it talks about adding movies or asks me whether I've seen these movies. Please tell me how to get rid of these, because they're disgusting.

Hi Ann. We're sorry you're experiencing this issue. It's not possible to block Facebook Ads, however, you can report an ad you've seen by filling out a form in the Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1guNtsU  - Leigh
